message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this valuable product. Given its worth, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,300,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so feel free to share your thoughts.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm really interested in this product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is significant. Let's meet halfway â€“ how about $1,100,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to meet you at $950,000.
